title: Aural set, B-flat major/simple error detection m 7

content.description: Questions 9-12 are based on an excerpt that will be played four times. The score is printed correctly below, but in the version you will hear, several measures contain errors in either pitch or rhythm. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read Questions 9-12 and look at the score.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
